name: City Airport Transport: Bus Simulator 3D
description:
Work at the aviation industry! Drive a bus to transport passengers from terminal to the boarding area and explore huge city airport!
Complete driving and parking missions and transfer people with their baggage right to the stair car! Check this unusual airport simulator that will put you not in the pilot seat, but behind the steering wheel of realistic airport bus! Hurry up and transport passengers on time, because each aircraft has very strict flight schedule! Are you tired of working in city public transportation system? Driving between plane boarding area and the transfer zone is funnier than it seems!

Control huge airport bus with realistic physics and complete driving, parking and transporting missions. Maneuver through runway full of parked planes, aircrafts, pushing tractors, boarding stairs and other vehicles! Improve your skills helping plane crew to take off on time! Provide harmonious work of whole airport being a bus driver!

Is it’s easy to park huge airport bus near the aircraft? Get to know with City Airport Transport: Bus Simulator 3D! Transport passengers and luggage safe, your aren’t going to be fired, huh? Check our airport simulator in 3D and get ultimate experience of driving huge vehicle! Working at the city airport is fun! Seat behind the wheel of your bus and help pilots and plane’s crew to take off and start their flight!

City Airport Transport: Bus Simulator 3D features:

- Great bus simulator in city airport’s environments
- Driving, parking, transporting and transferring missions
- Maneuver your bus through airport’s runway full of parked aircrafts, buses and more
- Amazing 3D graphics

Help passenger to board on their planes on time! Drive a bus, transport baggage and help passenger to get to the terminal they need! Don’t forget about transfer flights! Help pilots to take off on time! Try City Airport Transport: Bus Simulator 3D and start your driver’s career working at the aviation industry!
